articles.title: How to Buy Near-Risk-Free Treasuries With Bond Yields at 5% - Markets Insider
articles.description: Treasury bonds are offering the highest yields in 16 years. There are two main avenues you can use to lock in a nearly risk-free 5% return.
articles.content:
It may be time to load up on US debt as Treasury yields hover around 5%, offering investors healthy, ultra-low-risk returns while the stock market continues to be hit with volatility.
